<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Zuferian](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1569)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 37</row>

**Perception** +26

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +26, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +27, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +31, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +25, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +26, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +7

**Con** +4

**Int** +8

**Wis** +7

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Infused Items** Zuferian's items listed as infused last for 24 hours, or until her next daily preparations.

**Items**
[infused greater acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74) (4), [greater alchemist goggles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=408), [infused greater alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) (4), [Alchemist's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2), greater elixirs of life, formula book, [infused greater frost vial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77) (4), _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, +2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [light mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5), [infused greater thunderstone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=79) (4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +29 

**Will** +27 

</row>

**HP** 265

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_light mace_ +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 2d4+8

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
alchemical bomb +30 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** varies by bomb

**Alchemical Formulas**   [greater acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), [greater alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), [greater bottled lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), [greater darkvision elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=89), [deathcap powder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=111), [greater elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), [greater frost vial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77), [lethargy poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120), [purple worm venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=126), [greater tanglefoot bag](/Equipment.aspx?ID=78)

**Expanded Splash**   Zuferian's bombs that have the [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) trait deal 8 extra splash damage, and splash to 10 feet.

**Quick Alchemy** <actions string="Single Action" />  Zuferian creates a single alchemical item from her formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the [infused](/Traits.aspx?ID=94) trait, but it remains potent only until the start of her next turn. With her typical preparations, she can use this ability 7 times per day.

**Quick Bomber** <actions string="Single Action" />  Zuferian Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.

**[True Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=118)**   Ever inventive, you have discovered increasingly devastating ways for your bombs to impede and hamper your foes. When you use [Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=103), add the following to the list of effects you can choose from: enfeebled 2, stupefied 2, or a –15-foot status penalty to Speeds. If you instead apply one of the effects listed in Debilitating Bomb, the target avoids the effect only if the result of its saving throw is a critical success.

**[Uncanny Bombs](/Feats.aspx?ID=115)**   You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance. When you throw an alchemical item with the [bomb](/Traits.aspx?ID=21) trait, its range increment increases to 60 feet, you reduce any circumstance bonus to the target's AC from cover by 1, and you automatically succeed at the flat check when targeting a [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) creature.

</column>
name: Zuferian
